name: MUSASHI (Waykzen)
description:
This is a prototype and gameplay proof of concept

Concept:

MUSASHI is a small gameplay proof of concept. You wield a sword that is entirely controllable with the mouse and its buttons, allowing an infinite number of different attacks. Moreover, it is possible to defend yourself against enemy attacks coming from all sides. There are few keys, but the controls are quite complex and not necessarily very intuitive; that's why MUSASHI could offer an exciting e-sport with mechanics that have never been seen until now.

Controls

ZQSD to move

Right click to hold the sword's guard

Right click and Left click to attack

I hope you like it.

All feedbacks are welcome🤞

This prototype might be a little bit laggy and CPU hungry
